bibl.title: φανταζομένη in PGM VII 888 - a Possible Parallel.
bibl.note: A parallel in the late magico-medical work known as the Cyranides suggests that φανταζομένη in P.G.M. VII, 888 is a true passive, "terrified by visions or phantasms".
bibl.seg: BAIN David, φανταζομένη in PGM VII 888 - a Possible Parallel.
A parallel in the late magico-medical work known as the Cyranides suggests that φανταζομένη in P.G.M. VII, 888 is a true passive, "terrified by visions or phantasms".
